name: Rotation (itch) (Bbomb11)
description:
Rotate Your Environment to Get Out Of The Box!

Created in 1 week for the Geojam.

The Theme was The Other Side, so I accomplished this theme by making it so you have to rotate to the other side.

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCiZ9HP3VGWYU41Dx5Qb7ZCA

Discord: https://discord.gg/3b6EMUhE6Z

Made With Love :)
